    Authors and Citation

    Authors

    • De Cock Bavo. Author, maintainer.

    • Nieboer Daan. Author.

    • Van Calster Ben. Author.

    • Steyerberg Ewout. Author.

    • Vergouwe Yvonne. Author.

    Citation

    Van Calster, B., Nieboer, D., Vergouwe, Y., De Cock, B., Pencina, M.J., Steyerberg, E.W. (2016). A calibration hierarchy for risk models was defined: from utopia to empirical data. Journal of Clinical Epidemiology, 74, pp. 167-176. doi: 10.1016/j.jclinepi.2015.12.005.
